properties.name: CIDHAL - Centro de información y documentación para mujeres
properties.description: Posted by BerfikirCIDHAL ofrece apoyo médico y sicológico a mujeres sobrevivientes de violencia, además de dar a conocer la problemática via programas de radio y en su centro de documentación. CIDHAL offers medical and pyschological support to women survivors of violence, as well as information on VAW through their radio programme and documentation center

properties.name: Comité contra los feminicidios en Morelos
properties.description: Posted by BerfikirEl Comité contra los feminicidios en Morelos, ha sido un grupo que constantemente ha denunciado el aumento de los asesinatos en contra de mujeres como la forma extrema de violencia de género – violencia feminicida - y el trato discriminatorio que se da a las mismas por parte de algunos funcionarios y servidores públicos, cuando las atienden o hacen declaraciones que “justifican” estos feminicidios.

properties.name: Feria de la No Violencia hacia las Mujeres
properties.description: Posted by BerfikirFeria de muchas organizaciones en México quienes combaten la violencia. LaNeta presentó la Campaña Dominemos la Tecnología en la Feria. Many organisations fighting against violence against women participated in the Mexico City Fair against VAW. Laneta\'s stand promoted the Take Back the Tech! Campaign.

properties.name: MUJEMTIC - Mujeres empoderadas por la tecnología - Capacitaciones por Laneta
properties.description: Posted by BerfikirLaneta ha capacitado a más que 100 mujeres en DF, Morelia, Cuernavaca, y pronto en Oaxaca y San Cristobal de las Casas, en como usar herramientas de internet para su activismo en contra de la violencia hacia las mujeres LaNeta has trained more than 100 women in Mexico City, Cuernavaca, Morelia, and soon in Oaxaca and San Cristobal de las Casas, in how to use internet tools for activism against VAW

properties.name: MUJEMTIC - Mujeres empoderadas por la tecnología - Capacitaciones por Laneta
properties.description: Posted by BerfikirLaNeta ha capacitado a más que 100 mujeres en DF, Michoacan, Morelos, y pronto en Chiapas y Oaxaca sobre cómo usar herramientas en internet para su activismo, para luchar en contra de la violencia hacia las mujeres. LaNeta has trained more than 100 women in Mexico City, Michoacan, Morelos and soon in Chiapas and Oaxaca, on how to use internet for their activism against VAW

properties.name: Organizaciones de mujeres protestan en Cuernava
properties.description: Posted by BerfikirVarias organizaciones de mujeres de Cuernavaca se manifestaron en el Zocalo el dia 25 de Noviembre, 2007. Women\'s organisations protested in the City square on the 25th of November, 2007.

properties.name: SOS SMS for Filipino Overseas Workers in Distress
properties.description: Posted by BerfikirThe Center for Migrant Advocacy activates its SOS SMS System for OFWs in distress. It is a text-based messaging system that facilitates OFWs\' request for help and/or information from government and CMA. Simply text SOS and text to +63 9209 OFW SOS (+63 9209 639 767). The text is received simultaneously by Departmetn of Foreign Affais of the Phlippines, the Overseas Workers Welfare Assocation and CMA for appropriate action.

properties.name: Saartjie Baartman Centre for Women and Children
properties.description: Posted by Berfikir The first \'one-stop\' women\'s centre of its kind in South Africa. With its on-site partner organisations, the Centre offers a range of services, such as safe accommodation, counselling, job skills training, legal advice, to women and their children who experience domestic and/or sexual violence.

properties.name: Scottish Women's Aid
properties.description: Posted by BerfikirScottish Women\'s Aid 2nd Floor, 132 Rose Street, Edinburgh EH2 3JD Tel: (0131) 226 6606 Local groups present at various locations throughout Scotland

properties.name: Sede Colectivo Jk´optik
properties.description: Posted by BerfikirSomos un colectivo que apoya el fortalecimiento de organizaciones que promueven los derechos de las mujeres

properties.name: Speak out! Stand out! Commit to preventing Violence against Women
properties.description: Posted by BerfikirUgandaWomen of Uganda Network (WOUGNET) in collaboration with Womensnet, South Africa and APC-Africa-Women (AAW), is conducting an SMS-based campaign. The idea is to send out SMSs on each of the 16 Days of Activism that will allow individuals and organisations to Speak Out, Stand Out, and Commit to preventing Violence against Women. The daily SMSs are also posted to a blog on the Take Back the Tech campaign website at: http://www.takebackthetech.net/blogathon/wougnet.
